DOC.brief_summary: The investigator intend check whether efficacy TBE-vaccine substantially deteriorate patient rheumatoid arthritis treat drug suppress immune system . The investigator aim detect difference least 10 % compare healthy individual ( historical control ) protection analyse serology . If investigator detect difference , investigator continue explore whether protection achieve additional dos
DOC.brief_title: TBE-vaccine Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis Who Are Using Immunosuppressive Drugs
DOC.criteria: Rheumatoid arthritis treat methotrexate and/or TNFalfa block drug Interest vaccinate Written consent Age 18 year Previous TBEinfection Previous Vaccination TBE Pregnancy Breast feeding Treatment rituximab last 9 month Inability follow study protocol
